nodes.description: 2002年11月21日，25岁的罗马尼亚游客Mircea Varga在以色列耶路撒冷Kiryat Menahem社区乘坐No.20 Egged公交车
nodes.support_text: Mircea Varga Nov 21, 2002 - Mircea Varga, 25, a tourist from Romania, was one of 11 people killed in a suicide bombing on a No. 20 Egged bus in the Kiryat Menahem neighborhood of Jerusalem.

nodes.description: 7:00 A.M.在Mexico Street上车时，Mircea Varga与携带5公斤炸弹的袭击者同车
nodes.support_text: The bomber... boarded the bus at approximately 7:00 A.M. on Mexico street in Kiryat Menahem.

nodes.description: 公交车行至下一站点前，袭击者在车前部引爆炸弹
nodes.support_text: Before it reached the next stop, the terrorist... set off the bomb

nodes.description: 爆炸造成11人死亡、50人受伤，Mircea Varga成为遇难者之一
Mircea Varga五周前从罗马尼亚赴以色列，与在以色列工作的姐姐Luciana同住
nodes.support_text: Mircea Varga arrived in Israel five weeks ago from Romania.

nodes.description: 爆炸当日Luciana要求Mircea独自乘车，两人原计划共同通勤
nodes.support_text: on the morning of the bombing Luciana asked him to go on without her

nodes.description: Mircea遗体被运回罗马尼亚边境城市Moldava安葬，留下父母和三个兄弟姐妹
nodes.support_text: Mircea Varga was buried in his home town in Romania, on the border with Moldava.

nodes.description: Mircea Varga开始在耶路撒冷工作以偿还罗马尼亚的债务
nodes.support_text: Mircea Varga began working in Jerusalem to repay his debts to Romania

edges.support_text: Before it reached the next stop, the terrorist... set off the bomb
He is survived by his parents and three siblings
Mircea Varga arrived in Israel five weeks ago from Romania.
Mircea Varga arrived in Israel five weeks ago from Romania.
on the morning of the bombing Luciana asked him to go on without her
